---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

tissues <- c(ACCT = "Acbc", ICCT = "IL", LCCT = "LHB", PCCT = "PL", VCCT = "VoLo")

expr <- tibble(tissue = tissues) %>%
    group_by(tissue) %>%
    summarise(
        read_tsv(str_glue("data/expression/ensembl-gene_log2_{tissue}.bed.gz"),
                 col_types = cols(`#chr` = "-", start = "-", end = "-",
                                  gene_id = "c", .default = "d")) %>%
            filter(gene_id == "ENSRNOG00000062090") %>% # Sry
            pivot_longer(-gene_id, names_to = "rat_id", values_to = "expr"),
        .groups = "drop"
    )

covar <- read_csv("data/DemographicInfo_TN_RNASeq_88_LauraSaba.csv",
                  col_types = cols(rat_rfid = "c", batchnumber = "c",
                                   sex_mf = "c", .default = "-")) %>%
    mutate(individual = toupper(rat_rfid))
```
